description:
- Fixed track names
- Added chord names to James' acoustic guitar
- Fixed up the notes in Kirk's guitar that had "triplet" written above
- Added empty vocal track for someone else to do. I would myself but I am still practicing tabbing out vocals and do not have the skill to create one worthy of this site
- Cleaned up some messy ties and rests, especially during the clean part of the solo
